title: My Art Journey
script:
Namaste dosto! Aaj main aapse apne kala ke safar ke bare mein baat karna chahta hoon.

Bachpan mein, main hamesha deewaron pe, kitabon pe kuch na kuch banata rehta tha. Maa daat ti thi, par dil mein ek chahat thi, rangon se khelne ki. Tab pata nahi tha ki yehi meri zindagi ban jaegi.

Fir ek din, school mein painting competition hua. Maine ek chota sa gaon banaya. Mitti ke rang, hare bhare khet... Aur mujhe first prize mila! Woh momentâ€¦ woh kabhi nahi bhool sakta.

Us din se maine kabhi peeche mudke nahi dekha. Seekha, gir ke utha, naye techniques try kiye. Abhi bhi seekh raha hoon.

Art sirf ek shauq nahi hai dosto. Ye mera passion hai, meri pehchaan hai. Meri kahani hai, jo main har brushstroke mein kehta hoon. Umeed hai aapko bhi apni kahani mil jaaye. Dhanyavaad!
